system.effect: The attack cooks the target's face, melting his features and damaging his eyes. The target suffers [[1d5]] levels of Fatigue and is Blinded for [[1d10]] hours. Permanently reduce his Fellowship and Perception characteristics by [[1d5]].

description.value:
Energy Damage to Head (Severity 6)

The attack cooks the target's face, melting his features and damaging his eyes. The target suffers [[1d5]] levels of Fatigue and is Blinded for [[1d10]] hours. Permanently reduce his Fellowship and Perception characteristics by [[1d5]].
